kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
